summary: Sites & Funnels Suite S2-S5 testing completed successfully. All 27 backend API tests pass. Admin dashboard at /sites-funnels-suite/admin loads correctly with stats, quick actions, capability coverage (6 progress bars), and demo mode badge. Navigation to partner portal pages works correctly (redirects to login when not authenticated).
critical_code_review_comments: Suite uses real database (Prisma) for data persistence - NOT MOCKED
Admin dashboard at /sites-funnels-suite/admin does NOT require authentication (as designed)
Partner portal pages (/partner-portal/sites, /partner-portal/funnels) correctly require authentication
Demo badges correctly displayed on Sites and Funnels pages in partner portal
Progress component correctly renders capability coverage bars
All 6 capability categories display with correct percentages: Core Sites 95%, Funnels 75%, Domain & Branding 98%, Analytics 80%, AI Layer 70%, Governance 90%
Gaps are correctly highlighted in orange: Upsell/Downsell, A/B Testing, Heatmaps, Session Recording, AI Page Suggestions, AI Funnel Optimization, Audit Logging, Version History

success_rate.frontend: 100% (Admin dashboard loads correctly, all UI elements present, navigation works)

test_credentials: demo.owner@webwaka.com / Demo2026! (used for authenticated API tests)
seed_data_creation: None - uses existing Phase 5 database implementation
context_for_next_testing_agent: Sites & Funnels Suite S2-S5 formalization is complete. The suite overview API at /api/sites-funnels-suite returns config, stats, capabilities, and demo info. Admin dashboard at /sites-funnels-suite/admin shows capability coverage with progress bars. Partner portal pages require authentication and tenant with Sites & Funnels capability enabled.

backend_apis: GET /api/sites-funnels-suite - Returns suite config, stats, capabilities, demo info (PASSED)
GET /api/sites-funnels-suite - Returns correct suite name 'Sites & Funnels' (PASSED)
GET /api/sites-funnels-suite - Returns config with capabilities, routes, apis (PASSED)
GET /api/sites-funnels-suite - Returns stats for sites, funnels, templates, ai (PASSED)
GET /api/sites-funnels-suite - Returns demo info with isDemo=true, dataSource='Database (Prisma)' (PASSED)
GET /api/sites-funnels-suite - Returns session info (authenticated=false without auth) (PASSED)
GET /api/sites-funnels-suite - Returns all 6 capability categories with correct structure (PASSED)
POST /api/sites-funnels-suite action=get-config - Returns config with auth (PASSED)
POST /api/sites-funnels-suite action=get-capabilities - Returns capabilities with overallCoverage (PASSED)
GET /api/sites-funnels/funnels?action=list - Returns 403 (capability not enabled) with auth (PASSED)
GET /api/sites-funnels/sites?action=list - Returns 403 (capability not enabled) with auth (PASSED)
frontend_pages: /sites-funnels-suite/admin - Dashboard loads with header, DEMO MODE badge, Refresh button
/sites-funnels-suite/admin - Stats cards: Sites (0), Funnels (0), Total Views (0), Conversions (0)
/sites-funnels-suite/admin - Quick action cards: Manage Sites, Manage Funnels, Templates, AI Content
/sites-funnels-suite/admin - Capability Coverage section with 6 progress bars and correct percentages
/sites-funnels-suite/admin - Features displayed with green checkmarks (18 items)
/sites-funnels-suite/admin - Gaps displayed with orange warnings (8 items)
/sites-funnels-suite/admin - Documentation card with User Guide and Capability Mapping links
/sites-funnels-suite/admin - Suite Information card with Version, Baseline, Data Source, Primary User
/sites-funnels-suite/admin - Demo Mode Active notice at bottom
/partner-portal/sites - Redirects to login when not authenticated
/partner-portal/funnels - Redirects to login when not authenticated
ui_interactions: Refresh button - Clickable and refreshes data (PASSED)
Progress bars - 6 bars render correctly with capability percentages (PASSED)

mocked_apis_note: NOT MOCKED - Sites & Funnels Suite uses real database (Prisma) for data persistence. This is the existing Phase 5 implementation being formalized as a first-class vertical suite.
